Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Доброе утро, класс.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Good morning, class.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Вначале небольшое объявление.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Let’s start with today’s schedule.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Как многие уже слышали...”{Next}“Сегодня вечером, кандидаты в сиды{Line} сдают полевой экзамен.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“There seem to have been some rumors{Line} flying around since yesterday...”{Next}“Yes, the field exam for SeeD candidates{Line} will begin later this afternoon.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Остальные, в том числе засыпавшиеся{Line} на контрольной, продолжают занятия,{Line} согласно расписанию.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Those not participating and those who{Line} failed last week’s written test are to{Line} remain here in study hall.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Экзаминуемые свободны.”{Next}“Рекомендую с пользой{Line} потратить оставшееся время.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Field exam participants will{Line} have free time until the exam.”{Next}“Just be sure you’re in top condition.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Встречаемся в 16:00,{Line} в холе первого этажа.”{Next}“Там же вас распределят{Line} по командам.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Meet in hall at 1600 hours.{Line} I’ll announce the team assignments there.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Вопросы есть?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Any questions?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Да... {Char Seifer}!..”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Oh, and Seifer!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Во время спаринга, использование магии{Line} и приёмов, ставящих под угрозу жизнь и{Line} здоровье студентов, строжайше запрещено!”{Next}“Тем более, если твой партнёр не связан{Line} со стражем. Как представитель дисциплинарного{Line} коммитета, ты должен соблюдать все правила{Line} академии! Будь осторожнее...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Do NOT injure your partner{Line} while training.”{Next}“Be careful from now on.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Все свободны.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Field exam participants,{Line} I will see you all later.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}, подойди.{Line} Мне нужно с тобой поговорить.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“And {Char Squall},{Line} I need to talk to you.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}, ты ведь ещё{Line} не был в {Color Blue}〖Огненной пещере〗{Color White}?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You haven’t been to the{Line} {Color Blue}〖Fire Cavern〗{Color White} yet, have you?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Я не могу допустить тебя до экзамена.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You won’t be able to take part in{Line} today’s SeeD exam if you don’t pass{Line} this prerequisite.”

Monologue.Current: (Я хотел пойти сегодня утром, но {Char Seifer}...)
Monologue.Original: (...I was gonna go this morning,{Line} but Seifer...)

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Есть уважительная причина?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Hm? Do you have a good excuse?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Никак нет!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Not really.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“В таком случае, идём сейчас.{Line} Время до отбытия ещё есть.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Then let’s get going.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Если тебе нужно подготовиться,{Line} воспользуйся {Color Blue}〖учебной панелью〗{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“If you’re not too confident yet,{Line} you can review your studies{Line} at the {Color Blue}〖study panel〗{Color White}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Я буду ждать у {Color Blue}〖главных ворот〗{Color White},{Line} не задерживайся.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I’ll be waiting at the {Color Blue}〖front gate〗{Color White},{Line} so come down when you’re ready.”

Monologue.Current: {Color Yellow}Руководство{Color White}{Line}“{Color Blue}〖Учебная панель〗{Color White} находится{Line} на {Color Blue}〖твоей парте〗{Color White}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You can access the{Line} {Color Blue}〖study panel〗{Color White}{Line} from {Color Blue}〖your seat〗{Color White}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}, ты куда?{Line} Я же сказала, мне нужно{Line} с тобой поговорить.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, where are you going?{Line} I thought I told you I needed to talk to you.”

Monologue.Current: “Сделай что-нибудь со своей{Line} кислой физиономией, когда{Line} рядом инструктор Трип!”
Monologue.Original: “You better show some{Line} courtesy to Instructor Trepe.”

Monologue.Current: “Улыбайся, когда разговариваешь{Line} с инструктором... Ну, хотя бы попробуй!”
Monologue.Original: “Try to smile a little when{Line} you’re talking to the instructor.”

Monologue.Current: “Понимаешь, какую честь{Line} тебе оказала инструктор?”
Monologue.Original: “It’s an honor to be{Line} called over by Instructor Trepe.”

Monologue.Current: “Наедине с инструктором Трип...”
Monologue.Original: “Alone with Instructor Trepe...”

Monologue.Current: “Как же я тебе завидую!..{Line} Нужно было выбирать этот{Line} предмет!..”
Monologue.Original: “I...I’m so jealous!{Line} Maybe I should take up that subject, too...”

Monologue.Current: “Если ты... Если с инструктором{Line} что-нибудь случится, «триповцы»{Line} тебя из-под земли достанут!”
Monologue.Original: “Should anything happen to Instructor Trepe,{Line} the ‘Trepies’ will get you back!”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“Oh, the exam’s over?”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“Oh, the exam’s over?”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“You better not have caused{Line} Instructor Trepe any trouble!”{Line}No{Line}...Maybe a little
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“You better not have caused{Line} Instructor Trepe any trouble!”{Line}No{Line}...Maybe a little

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“Are you really looking out for{Line} Instructor Trepe? I KNOW, you know!?”{Next}“So far, you’ve been knocked out{Line} {Var 32} time(s), and Instructor Trepe{Line} has been knocked out {Var 33} time(s).”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“Are you really looking out for{Line} Instructor Trepe? I KNOW, you know!?”{Next}“So far, you’ve been knocked out{Line} {Var 32} time(s), and Instructor Trepe{Line} has been knocked out {Var 33} time(s).”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“...I can just picture Instructor Trepe{Line} fighting for you...”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“...I can just picture Instructor Trepe{Line} fighting for you...”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“Instructor Trepe has defeated {Var 34} enemies...{Line} And I had such an innocent image of her...”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“Instructor Trepe has defeated {Var 34} enemies...{Line} And I had such an innocent image of her...”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, let me give you your stats.{Line} You’ve defeated {Var 35} enemies{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}{Line} But I don’t even care about you!”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, let me give you your stats.{Line} You’ve defeated {Var 35} enemies{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}...{Pause 48}{Line} But I don’t even care about you!”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“A game of cards?”{Line}Play{Line}Nah
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“A game of cards?”{Line}Play{Line}Nah

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #3{Line}“You seem to know rules{Line} unfamiliar to this region.{Line} Let’s play a game with{Line} Balamb’s rules and ours.”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“Shucks, I lost!{Line} Let’s play again sometime!”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #02{Line}“Do you...stink?”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #02{Line}“Do you...stink?”

Monologue.Current: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“We’ll decide it next game!”
Monologue.Original: Trepe Groupie #2{Line}“We’ll decide it next game!”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“This Garden sure has{Line} a lot of cuties!”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“This Garden sure has{Line} a lot of cuties!”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“So like...I’ve been thinking about{Line} this for a while now...”{Next}“Maybe you should loosen up a bit?{Line} You’ll be sure to get girls that way...!”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“So like...I’ve been thinking about{Line} this for a while now...”{Next}“Maybe you should loosen up a bit?{Line} You’ll be sure to get girls that way...!”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Hmmm...tough choice...”{Next}“Now, do I go for the girl with the pigtail,{Line} or the one with the bob?{Line} Or how ‘bout that brunette...?”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Hmmm...tough choice...”{Next}“Now, do I go for the girl with the pigtail,{Line} or the one with the bob?{Line} Or how ‘bout that brunette...?”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Cards?{Line} I only play with girls.”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Cards?{Line} I only play with girls.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“Those regular uniforms are nice{Line} for a change. You stop wearin’{Line} them once you become a SeeD...”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Those regular uniforms are nice{Line} for a change. You stop wearin’{Line} them once you become a SeeD...”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“SeeD uniforms look sooo cool!{Line} They make you look kinda intelligent.”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“SeeD uniforms look sooo cool!{Line} They make you look kinda intelligent.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“The ‘GARDEN SQUARE’ BBS is{Line} so much fun.”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“The ‘GARDEN SQUARE’ BBS is{Line} so much fun.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“It gives you a lot of info about Garden.{Line} It’s pretty cool!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“It gives you a lot of info about Garden.{Line} It’s pretty cool!”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“I really wanna know who these{Line} initials stand for!”{Next}“Oh, but everyone better{Line} watch their manners!{Line} We should all have fun with it!”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“I really wanna know who these{Line} initials stand for!”{Next}“Oh, but everyone better{Line} watch their manners!{Line} We should all have fun with it!”

Monologue.Current: 『Tardiness is not tolerated.{Line} Repeat offenders will be penalized.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』
Monologue.Original: 『Tardiness is not tolerated.{Line} Repeat offenders will be penalized.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』

Monologue.Current: 『Magic use outside of designated{Line} areas is prohibited.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』
Monologue.Original: 『Magic use outside of designated{Line} areas is prohibited.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』

Monologue.Current: 『〖Garden Festival Committee〗{Line} Looking for volunteers!』
Monologue.Original: 『〖Garden Festival Committee〗{Line} Looking for volunteers!』

Monologue.Current: 『〖From the cafeteria〗{Line} Whenever buying hot dogs, mind your{Line} manners while waiting in line.』
Monologue.Original: 『〖From the cafeteria〗{Line} Whenever buying hot dogs, mind your{Line} manners while waiting in line.』

Monologue.Current: 『No alterations to uniforms allowed.{Line} They will be disposed of upon discovery.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』
Monologue.Original: 『No alterations to uniforms allowed.{Line} They will be disposed of upon discovery.{Line} 〖Disciplinary Committee〗』
